title: Shares of several materials companies are trading lower as markets sell off following recent rally and as investors await Wednesday's Fed announcement. Equities have gained over the past week amid optimism towards the US economic reopening and investors appear to be taking profits following run up.
Shares of several precious metals companies are trading higher amid market uncertainty following a drop in US retail sales and US-China tensions, which have made equities volatile for the session.
